caption: Finding a corpse was not an easy task. He needed to be a male, appropriate age, sound limbs, etc. In the end, they found an eligible body in a hospital, who was a tramp before his death. When the Germans discovered this body, they would definitely conduct a careful investigation on him. Therefore, they needed to give this tramp a new name, gave him a new identity, took photos of him, and fabricated his life story. The most important thing was to find him a lover. In the end, they chose a woman in the Twenty Committee. And the woman's request was to participate in this action.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, acient, modern, or in the future?

Is there more than three different characters appear?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at night and at day time.
